Name: Base Station Renewal, Fast Express Car Service, Inc., Bronx
Title: A Local Law in relation to the approval of the application of Fast Express Car Service, Inc. for the renewal of a license to operate a base station in the borough of The Bronx.
Text:
Be it enacted by the Council as follows:

      Section one. The application of Fast Express Car Service, Inc., for the renewal of a license to operate a base station at 405 Castle Hill Avenue in the borough of The Bronx, which application was approved by the taxi and limousine commission, is hereby approved. 
      ï¿½2. This local law shall take effect immediately. 



LS#35
01/15/98
